main event: Two yellow lights observed from an airliner, and five yellow lights observed to be stationary.
interesting points: The sighting occurred in the Pacific Ocean, at coordinates 21.50N 153.30W.
The sighting was reported by an airliner crew and occurred at 12/062342 GMT.
Marine aircraft were dropping illuminating flares and ordnance at the time of the sighting, which were visible up to 70 miles away.
The document includes a staff message branch report from the Department of the Air Force.
The report concludes that the sighting was likely caused by the marine aircraft activities.
